mapper.select: SELECT bom.bom_key, bom.root_key, pro.product_code, pro.product_name, bom.quantity, unit.sub_common_name AS unit_name, bom.finished_key as finished_key, pro.product_key as material_key FROM tbl_product_bom bom LEFT JOIN tbl_product pro ON bom.material_key = pro.product_key LEFT JOIN tbl_common_code_sub unit ON pro.unit_key = unit.sub_common_key WHERE bom.is_deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM tbl_product_bom WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND bom_key = #{bomKey}
